name: Formacar Action
description:
Google Play | Apple TestFlight

Formacar Action - a Web3 destiny of Play2Earn, Free2Play and Drive2Earn mechanics united under a cross-platformed GameFi product! Dive into the world of multiple game modes, starting from Sprint, Drift, Circuit and Freeride finishing with braking the boundaries between a personal mobile device and a real-world vehicle! Compete against other live players, receive rewards and take part in multiple social events! 

The access to four heart-thumping Play2Earn racing modes:

Circuit

Participate in timed races on looped tracks and compete for prizes and rewards.

Sprint

Be the first to get from Point A to Point B. All competitors start simultaneously. The race can be single, double (with a reverse run) and in a straight line.

Drift

Complete a track in a controlled drift state. The number of points awarded depends on your speed and the length of the drift slide. The longer the slide and the more spectacular your angle is, the higher your reward will be.

Freeride

A suburban highway, a village, a town block, an abandoned industrial plant or a dirt field – pick the racing environment you are most comfortable with and sense the ultimate freedom!

Maps (Game Tracks):

• Okutama

• Racetrack 

• Ship

• Tsuchisaka

In-Game Store:

• Vehicles

• Paints

• Tuning parts

Daily & Weekly Challenges

Completing in-game tasks, the player receives a rewards in the form of $FCC and $FCG tokens. The amount of the reward directly depends on the complexity of the task.

$FCG (FormaCarGame Token) is a utility token used by Formacar Action implemented on the BNB Chain. The token is used as a means for holding the main rounds (Seed, Private, Presale, DEX), buying/selling in-game NFTs, and receiving royalties (dividends) from winning mechanics provided for by the various game modes of Formacar Action.

$FCC is an in-game token with unlimited emission. The token is used for $FCG conversion purposes when buying of selling in-game objects (cars, tuning kits or individual parts). The token cannot be transferred of converted into any external currency.
